narrate swarm.description: Run a lightweight narration swarm with presets and YAML merging. When audiences are provided, an internal audience_adapter agent emits <aud>_version outputs. Provenance is recorded per agent with started/model/prompt_ref/duration_ms and included in the Narrative Pack.
narrate swarm.doc: Run a lightweight narration swarm with presets and YAML merging. When audiences are provided, an internal audience_adapter agent emits <aud>_version outputs. Provenance is recorded per agent with started/model/prompt_ref/duration_ms and included in the Narrative Pack.
narrate swarm.epilog: Provenance fields: agent, model, started (RFC3339), prompt_ref, duration_ms. Use '-P help' to list presets. Unknown preset exits 2 with suggestions.

options.--help: show this help message and exit
options.--preset: Preset template name (use '-P help' to list presets)
options.--pack: Output file for Narrative Pack (yaml or json); '-' for stdout
options.--rubric: Path to critic rubric YAML (defaults to packaged critic rubric)

--input.help: Optional input file path or '-' for stdin (JSON/YAML autodetect; falls back to text)

--attach-images.help: Attach images from input_data.images to LLM calls (multimodal models only)

--strict-grounding.help: Fail the run if critic flags ungrounded content

options.--guardrails: Guardrails (.rail) schema applied to stage outputs (optional)

--strict-guardrails.help: Fail the run if guardrails validation fails

options.--memory: Provenance store path (SQLite). Use '-' for in-memory/no file.
